thread.title: BRIEF-TRS Investments Refers To Use Of Vie Structure With Shenyang Lida Agricultural Science And Technology Group

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TRS Investments Refers To Use Of Vie Structure With Shenyang Lida Agricultural Science And Technology Group

organizations.name: shenyang lida agricultural science and technology group

text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Trs Investments Ltd:
* ‍REFERS TO USE OF VIE STRUCTURE WITH RESPECT TO DEAL WITH SHENYANG LIDA AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY GROUP
* ‍NZX ADVISED TRS THAT NZX WILL NOT LIST A CO WITH A VARIABLE INTEREST ENTITY STRUCTURE ON NZ MARKET​
* WILL NOW SEEK TO FIND ALTERNATIVE WAY TO STRUCTURE DEAL WITH SHENYANG LIDA AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY GROUP LTD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
